verses.verse: <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> you have been <S%H7521>favorable<s%> to your <S%H776>land.<s%> You have <S%H7725>restored<s%> the <S%H7622>fortunes<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%>
You have <S%H5375>forgiven<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of your <S%H5971>people.<s%> You have <S%H3680>covered<s%> all their <S%H2403>sin.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
You have taken <S%H622>away<s%> all your <S%H5678>wrath.<s%> You have <S%H7725>turned<s%> from the <S%H2740>fierceness<s%> of your <S%H639>anger.<s%>
<S%H7725>Turn<s%> <S%H430>us,<s%> God of our <S%H3468>salvation,<s%> and cause your <S%H3708>indignation<s%> toward us to <S%H6565>cease.<s%>
Will you be <S%H599>angry<s%> with us <S%H5769>forever?<s%> Will you draw <S%H4900>out<s%> your <S%H639>anger<s%> to <S%H1755>all<s%> <S%H1755>generations?<s%>
<S%H2421>Won't<s%> you revive us <S%H7725>again,<s%> that your <S%H5971>people<s%> may rejoice in <S%H8055>you?<s%>

I will <S%H8085>hear<s%> what <S%H410>God,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> will <S%H1696>speak,<s%> for he will <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%> to his <S%H5971>people,<s%> his <S%H2623>saints;<s%> but let them not turn <S%H7725>again<s%> to <S%H3690>folly.<s%>
Surely his <S%H3468>salvation<s%> is <S%H7138>near<s%> those who <S%H3373>fear<s%> <S%H3519>him,<s%> that glory may <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in our <S%H776>land.<s%>
<S%H2617>Mercy<s%> and <S%H571>truth<s%> meet <S%H6298>together.<s%> <S%H6664>Righteousness<s%> and <S%H7965>peace<s%> have kissed each <S%H5401>other.<s%>
<S%H571>Truth<s%> springs <S%H6779>out<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%> <S%H6664>Righteousness<s%> has looked <S%H8259>down<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yes,<s%> Yahweh will <S%H5414>give<s%> that which is <S%H2896>good.<s%> Our <S%H776>land<s%> will <S%H5414>yield<s%> its <S%H2981>increase.<s%>
